text: 3|50|enṟe mumpiluḷḷa teṟāttine satyappeṭuttunnavanāyikkeāṇṭuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe mēl niṣid'dhamākkappeṭṭa kāryaṅṅaḷil cilat niṅṅaḷkk anuvadiccu taruvān vēṇṭiyumākunnu (ñān niyēāgikkappeṭṭiṭṭuḷḷat‌). niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkal ninnuḷḷa dr̥ṣṭāntavuṁ niṅṅaḷkk ñān keāṇṭu vannirikkunnu. ākayāl niṅṅaḷ allāhuve sūkṣikkukayuṁ enne anusarikkukayuṁ ceyyuvin
